an5.125:4.3: Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, akālacārī ca hoti, abrahmacārī ca.
an5.125:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.
an5.125:5.3: Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ jānāti, pariṇatabhojī ca hoti, kālacārī ca hoti, brahmacārī ca.
an5.125:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
